articles.author: Myra P. Saefong, Isabel Wang, Gordon Gottsegen, Vivien Lou Chen, William Watts, Jamie Chisholm
articles.title: Stock Market Today: Dow and S&P 500 trade near flat, Nasdaq edges higher; tariff fears wane and Tesla in focus after sales dive again. - MarketWatch
articles.description: Follow all the latest U.S. market action for Tuesday here to see if Wall Street can extend its latest rebound, and if Big Tech can again take the lead
